pages.title: Knowledge Stars
pages.text: $(#033dfc)Knowledge Stars$() are used to unlock $(#033dfc)Researches$() that can help you further progress in the game!$(br2)Each $(#033dfc)Research$() costs a certain amount of $(#033dfc)Knowledge Stars$(), and upon unlocking that mod, all other mods will have their cost increased by an indicated amount.
Crafting $(#033dfc)Knowledge Stars$()$(br2)$(#033dfc)Star Essence$() can be found inside $(#033dfc)Vaults$() or purchased from $(#033dfc)Vendor Traders$().
